channel.title: Morning Mail
channel.description: Stay updated on the latest news and events happening in the RPI community.

item.title: Gateways Shuttle Service to be Available for Holiday/Winter Break
item.description: Rensselaer’s Department of Parking and Transportation is pleased to announce that it will once again be offering Gateways shuttle transportation to and from regional destination points - including the Amtrak train station, the Albany International Airport, and the Albany bus terminal - for the upcoming holiday/winter break. Be sure to submit your transportation request by Tuesday, December 17!
item.author: Students

item.title: Researchers Part of NSF-Funded Engineering Research Center Focused on U.S. Rubber Industry
item.description: Rensselaer researchers are part of a multi-institution team working to bring rubber production to the United States and better secure the supply chain for this critical material.
item.author: Community

item.title: Rensselaer at Work Session to Highlight Single Course Enrollment Options
item.description: Date: Wednesday, December 18, 2024 3:00 PM - 3:30 PM - Register to join Rensselaer at Work Dean Aric Krause, Ph.D., as he reviews the online graduate programs for working professionals and provides course enrollment options to make an immediate impact on one’s work. Participants can also explore courses for developing valuable skills that benefit employee and employer alike.
item.author: Community

item.title: Morning Mail Service to be Suspended During Holiday/Winter Break
item.description: DotCIO’s Web Services team asks the campus community to note that the daily Morning Mail service will be on temporary hiatus from Monday, December 23, 2024 through Wednesday, January 1, 2025, while the Institute is closed for its annual holiday/winter break.
item.author: Community

item.title: DotCIO Schedules License Server Maintenance for December 23
item.description: On December 23 between 8am to 8pm ET, DotCIO will be performing maintenance on the license servers used for software activation on campus. During this time, license servers will be restarted and those who use the software that utilize these license servers may temporarily experience license activation issues.
item.author: Community

item.title: ChatGPT/AI Tools Informal Community Space Created
item.description: An informal community Webex space has been created to collaborate on AI tool use in the classroom, and is available to share, collaborate, and brainstorm on this topic in an informal asynchronous setting. Interested faculty, staff, or graduate TAs who would like to be added to this community cohort space are asked to please email Maureen Fodera.
item.author: Faculty and Staff

item.title: HelioCampus Syllabus Available for Spring 25 Term
item.description:
The HelioCampus syllabus tool is available for faculty to update or complete for the spring semester. Multiple opportunities for HelioCampus syllabus assistance are available during in-person or virtual office hours with Amy Svirsky, Learning Assessment Specialist.

For information about sharing your news or events, or to change your subscription settings, visit morningmail.rpi.edu.
